description: Erection of a single storey side and rear wraparound extension
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications:(ADR.PU000.00.04.000001 (ground floor existing), ADR.PU100.00.04.000001 (first floor existing), ADR.PU300.00.04.000001 (second floor existing), ADR.E0000.00.07.000010, ADR.E0000.00.07.000020, ADR.E0000.00.07.000030, ADR.E0000.00.07.000040 & fire strategy plan. Received 03/03/2024
ADR.PU000.00.04.000001 (ground floor proposed rev.P5), ADR.PU100.00.04.000001 (first floor proposed rev.P5), ADR.PU300.00.04.000001 (second floor proposed rev.P5), ADR.E0000.00.07.000010 (rev.P5), ADR.E0000.00.07.000020 (rev.P5), ADR.E0000.00.07.000030 (rev.P5), ADR.E0000.00.07.000040 (rev.P5). Received: 24/04/2024)

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building, unless otherwise shown on the approved plans.
Condition : 4 - No additional windows or openings shall be formed in the side or front elevations of the development hereby permitted.

Condition : 5 - The extension hereby permitted shall only be used for a purpose ancillary to the enjoyment of the house at the 'Site Address' described at the top of this decision letter and shall not be occupied as a separate dwelling other than as described in the submitted application, nor used for business purposes and shall not have a separate external entrance.

Condition : 6 - Prior to commencement of any above ground works pursuant to the implementation of the extensions hereby approved, proof of demolition of the existing outbuilding shall have been submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval in writing.
